short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances ChatGPT user experience by adding interactive and efficient features for better ChatGPT use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"ChatGPT Xtra" is a Chrome extension designed to enhance the user experience on chat.openai.com by integrating convenient features for a more interactive and efficient conversation with ChatGPT. Key features include

Image attachment from web pages: This feature allows users to seamlessly attach images directly from any web page to new chat. By simply right-clicking on an image and selecting from the context menu.

Prompt combination with selected text: This feature allows users to combine their own typed prompt with text selected from any web page. When browsing online, users can highlight text, right click to access the context menu and choose to send that text along with their prompt to  ChatGPT.

Overall, "ChatGPT Xtra" enhances the functionality of chat.openai.com by making it more user-friendly and versatile, especially for those who frequently reference external content or wish to incorporate multimedia elements into their conversations with ChatGPT.
